  • Uses of JDBCDataSource in oracle.dbtools.plugin.api.jdbc

    Methods in oracle.dbtools.plugin.api.jdbc that return JDBCDataSource
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    JDBCDataSource
    JDBCDataSources.dataSource(String host)
    Attempts to retrieve the JDBCDataSource for the specified DNS host name
    JDBCDataSource
    JDBCDataSources.defaultDataSource()
    Retrieves the default JDBCDataSource if one is available.
